Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
```genie@StakedNotary:~/StakedNotary$ cd ../.komodo
genie@StakedNotary:~/.komodo$ find . -name debug.log -exec truncate -s 0 '{}' \;```
_bets that_ 👆🏽 _would clear out a ton of space_
